i: I Love Layla`Out of all of the people in the entire world, Layla is the one I want to be with forever.`Wyatt's amazing sweet girlfriend <33`Layla`what we would see on a zoo date`Capybara`never-ending for you, Layla`Love`"aww you're so ____!"`Cute`VERY CUTE! think about you and norman`Adorable`a big fluffy good boy who only sometimes rips things`Norman`old lady cat who is nice to wyatt (nickname)`Tume`a cat who is not very nice to Tume`Luna`A gray cat who loves you despite his hisses`Alex`Layla's cute boyfriend`Wyatt`

Layla's happy things`Layla likes a whole lot of things in her life, but she loves Wyatt Karnes the most.`this person helps make her more happy`Wyatt`Electronic handheld released in March 2011`Nintendo 3DS`Troublemaker when he wants to be`Norman James`What layla needs`Love`something to cuddle and sleep with when Wyatt isn't around`Wyatt's jacket`Layla likes to eat this for happy comfort`Tuna and Rice`Wyatt gave Layla this stuffed animal for Christmas`Flamingo`What we show with our hands every night`heart`Once in a while layla has a good one of these bodily sounds`Belch`

Wyatt Basics`He might seem fairly normal on the outside, but on the inside he's quite a different boy`Loves and is most loved by`Layla <3``Companion and sidekick`Tume`Airpods nickname`Burger Pods`Does Wyatt wear socks to bed?`Yes`Most cuddled item`Layla's shirt`His Hand held is what`New Nintendo 2DS XL`Favorite kind of cheez-its`Cheddar Jack`Has never heard layla do this, but knows it's going to happen at some point`Queef`
